title: Only the LTTE committed war crimes – Sajith
content: If war crimes had been committed in Sri Lanka they were only committed by the LTTE Sajith Premadasa said in Parliament today. He said this in response to a question posed by Wimal Weerawansa regarding an alleged statement given by Karu Jayasuriya to a newspaper. Wimal claims that in the statement Karu had proclaimed that…
